text: walaqad 'akhadh allah aleahd almwkkad ealaa bani 'iisrayiyl 'ana ykhlsu lah alebadt whdh, wamur allah musaa 'an yajeal ealayhim athnay eashar eryfana bieadad frwehm, yakhudhun ealayhim aleahd balsme waltaet lilah walirasulih wlktabh, waqal allah libani 'israyyl: 'iiniy maeakum bhfzy wnsry, layin 'aqamtum alslat, waetytm alzakat almafrudat msthqyha, wsddaqtm birusuli fima akhbrwkm bih wnsrtmwhm, wanfqtm fi sbyly, lakffirnn eankum syyatkm, wladkhilannakum jnat tajri min taht qswrha alanhar, faman jhd hdha almithaq minkum faqad eadal ean tariq alhaqu 'iilaa tariq aldlal
